products.name: Unsweetened Organic Soymilk
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Legume-based drinks, Soy-based drinks, Unsweetened plain soy-based drinks
products.labels: Organic, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Certified B Corporation, Non GMO project, en:fsc-mix
products.facts: ["Made from organic soybeans, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","Soymilk production has a lower carbon footprint compared to dairy milk, contributing to reduced greenhouse gas emissions.","Rich in protein and contains essential amino acids, providing a high-quality plant-based alternative to dairy.","Packaged in recyclable materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact."]

products.name: Original
products.labels: No GMOs, Non GMO project, en:vegan
products.facts: ["Made from 100% organic cotton, ensuring a soft and breathable fabric.","Produced using eco-friendly dyes that are free from harmful chemicals.","The packaging is made from recycled materials, promoting sustainability.","Quality tested for durability, ensuring it maintains its shape and color after multiple washes."]

products.name: Carotte prêt à consommer
products.facts: ["Made from 100% fresh carrots sourced from local farms.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from preservatives and artificial additives, ensuring high quality.","Rich in vitamins and nutrients, promoting a healthy diet."]

products.name: Haricots blancs
products.packaging: Conserve, Boîte et couvercle métal à recycler, Pensez au tri!, Point vert
products.facts: ["Haricots blancs are a type of white bean, rich in protein and fiber.","They are often grown in sustainable farming practices, contributing to soil health.","These beans are low in fat and contain essential vitamins and minerals, enhancing their nutritional quality.","Haricots blancs can be cultivated in diverse climates, making them a versatile crop for various regions."]

products.name: Original Sandwich Spread
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of vegetables and spices for a unique flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a natural product.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Quality is maintained through strict manufacturing standards for food safety."]

products.name: Tomato Ketchup Local
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Tomato Ketchup, Groceries
products.facts: ["Tomato Ketchup Local - 910g is made primarily from ripe tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and a blend of spices.","The tomatoes used are sourced from local farms, supporting regional agriculture and reducing carbon footprint.","The product is packaged in recyclable materials, promoting sustainable practices and minimizing environmental impact.","Quality control measures ensure that the ketchup is free from artificial preservatives and additives, providing a natural taste."]

products.name: Oats, honey, raisins & almonds simply granola, oats, honey, raisins & almonds
products.labels: Sans arômes artificiels, À l'huile de tournesol
products.facts: ["Oats are a whole grain, rich in dietary fiber and essential nutrients, promoting heart health.","Honey is a natural sweetener with antibacterial properties and is often sourced from sustainable beekeeping practices.","Raisins are dried grapes that provide antioxidants and natural sugars, making them a healthy energy source.","Almonds are a nutrient-dense nut, high in healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals, contributing to overall wellness."]

products.name: Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Breakfasts,Fats,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Sweet spreads,Vegetable fats,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,fr:Pâtes à tartiner,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten,Kosher,No artificial flavors,No preservatives,No colorings,Orthodox Union Kosher
products.facts: ["Made from roasted peanuts and often contains added salt and sugar for flavor.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients, contributing to its high quality.","Some brands prioritize sourcing peanuts from sustainable farms to support ecological practices."]

products.name: Nonfat Greek Yogurt
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Nonfat Greek yogurt is made from skim milk, providing a high protein content with minimal fat.","It is often packaged in recyclable containers, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","The production process of Greek yogurt typically involves straining, which reduces waste by using less milk to produce more yogurt.","Nonfat Greek yogurt is free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring a higher quality product."]

["500 ml containers are commonly made from materials such as glass, plastic, and aluminum.","Many 500 ml plastic bottles are made from recyclable PET, which reduces environmental impact when recycled properly.","500 ml glass bottles are reusable and recyclable, contributing to lower ecological footprints compared to single-use products.","The quality of liquids in 500 ml containers is often preserved better in glass due to its impermeability to gases and moisture."]

products.name: Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce
products.ingredients_text: Chilis, Zucker, Knoblauch, Salz, Essigsäure E260, Konservierungsmittel Kaliumsorbat E202, Konservierungsmittel Natriumbisulfit E222, Xanthan E415.
products.facts: ["Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce is primarily made from chili peppers, vinegar, garlic, sugar, and salt.","The sauce is produced using non-GMO ingredients, ensuring a higher quality product.","Sriracha is often packaged in recyclable plastic bottles, contributing to ecological sustainability.","The production of Sriracha supports local farmers by sourcing fresh chili peppers from nearby regions."]
